amendment.description: To curtail the international financing of terrorism, and to impose a one-year cooling off period for former Federal bank examiners.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3867 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3867 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S10351-10358) To curtail the international financing of terrorism, and to impose a one-year cooling off period for former Federal bank examiners.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3867 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Levin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3867 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
